Package com.g1.mychess.tournament.repository

Interface TournamentPlayerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<TournamentPlayer,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<TournamentPlayer,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<TournamentPlayer,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<TournamentPlayer,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<TournamentPlayer,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<TournamentPlayer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<TournamentPlayer,Long>
public interface TournamentPlayerRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<TournamentPlayer,Long>
Repository interface for accessing TournamentPlayer entities. Provides CRUD operations and custom queries related to tournament players.

  • Method Details

    • existsByTournamentIdAndPlayerId

      boolean existsByTournamentIdAndPlayerId(Long tournamentId, Long playerId)
      Checks if a player is already registered for a specific tournament.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - the tournament's ID
      playerId - the player's ID
      Returns:
      true if the player is registered for the tournament, false otherwise

    • findByTournamentIdAndPlayerId

      Optional<TournamentPlayer> findByTournamentIdAndPlayerId(Long playerId, Long tournamentId)
      Finds a TournamentPlayer by the tournament and player IDs.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the player's ID
      tournamentId - the tournament's ID
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the TournamentPlayer if found, or an empty Optional

    • findByTournamentId

      Optional<List<TournamentPlayer>> findByTournamentId(Long tournamentId)
      Finds all TournamentPlayer entries for a given tournament.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - the tournament's ID
      Returns:
      an Optional containing a list of TournamentPlayers for the tournament, or an empty Optional if no players are found
